properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(VHM_STATUS_CODE) AS RETURN_ELIGIBLE FROM VHM_EMP_LEAVE_REQUEST WHERE TRUNC(SYSDATE) > TRUNC(VHM_LEAVE_END_DATE) AND VHM_LEAVE_REQ_NO = :paramReqNo

UPDATE VHM_EMP_LEAVE_REQUEST SET VHM_RETURN_DATE = TO_DATE(:paramLeaveReturnDate,'DD/MM/YYYY'), VHM_RETURN_APP_EMP_CODE = :paramEmpReturnApprover, VHM_LEAVE_REQUEST_REMARKS = :paramLeaveReturnRemark, VHM_STATUS_CODE = '0000000001' WHERE VHM_LEAVE_REQ_NO = :paramReqNo
